basics.name: Kevin Colten
basics.label: CTO, Software Developer, Business Intelligence
basics.summary: Specializing in growing companies aiming to become tech-enabled and beyond by terraforming technology departments, installing development skills, management practices, unifying data and configuring business intelligence tools, building internal systems, and hiring the right staff.

work.summary: Managing technical infrastructure of 100+ vocational training schools across the US.
highlights: Setting a vision for how technology will be used in the company.
Ensuring that the technological resources meet the company's short and long-term needs.
Outline the goals for research and development.
Creating timelines for the development and deployment of all technological services.
Making executive decisions on behalf of the company's technological requirements.
Acting as a mentor to team members.
Maintaining a consumer-focused outlook and aiding in the delivering of IT projects to market.
Managing technology budgets and time frames.
Staying on top of technology trends and developments.
Ensuring all technology practices adhere to regulatory standards.

work.position: Chief Technology Officer + Senior Software Engineer + Lead Instructor
work.summary: In charge of all things technical, authored curriculums, and taught web development courses to adult learners.
highlights: Acquired 2019 by Zollege
Responsible for entire company software infrastructure
Created, maintained, and led interns and contributors on Campus Manager, our custom Learning Management System
Authored curriculums on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB
Developed workbooks with CI integration for linting
Maintained web presences for all four locations Austin, San Antonio, Houston, and Dallas
Built reporting infrastructure that combined data from multiple sources: Payments, CRM, LMS, etc. Ask me about YoSQL!
Implemented automation for web hooks, status checks, user events, reports, deployments, tests, etc.
Implementing/analyzing tracking services such as Google Analytics/Tag Manager, Facebook Pixel, click heatmaps, etc
SEO Optimization

work.summary: Develop web service around skill predicting and aligning machine-learning driven service
highlights: Work with modern web stack: React + Redux, Ruby on Rails
Agile environment and collaborative coding
Full Stack development, worked on all corners of the code base, services, and integrations

work.summary: Bokeh contributor, an open-source python driven graph generator. Implemented and designed client-specific projects and solutions.
highlights: Worked on https://anaconda.org, a packaging and environment manager repository
Contributed to open-source packages such as Bokeh (https://bokeh.pydata.org)
Fast-paced full-stack client-specific projects with modern web development stacks

work.summary: Designed, built, and maintained in-house internet software. Headed small team of web developers and quality assurance technicians.
highlights: Flourished in a fast-paced, agile environment
Developed deep PHP and Javascript skills
Learned and implemented new technologies often

projects.name: CMAsnap
projects.description: CMAsnap lets REALTORS produce a branded, accurate CMAs from anywhere, on any device in a fraction of the time it takes using the MLS. Simply enter the subject property address and get a full comp set in under 10 seconds. Choose the most appropriate comps from the list and CMAsnap does the rest.
highlights: Developed and launched CMA software for realtors
Built application from the ground up
Integrated into CRM to track sales, support, and marketing
Maintain Business Intelligence platform to monitor KPIs
Agile development environment
Enforce cybersecurity policies
Research and implement third party software
Hire and train new technology staff when needed
Marketing tech, sales ops, and web development

projects.name: Olive Us
projects.description: The Olive Us App is an alternative solution for matching families with qualified sitters who meet a family's unique needs. Our detailed matching questionnaires for sitters & families are based on more than a decade of experience in operating a full- service nanny placement agency. Our easy to use â€˜app' automates the matching, meeting and vetting process.
highlights: Premium Sitter Matching App
Built initial mobile app (NannyTribe)
React Native + Node.js/Express.js + Postgres
Beta release on TestFlight
Custom built matching algorithm
Project manage outsourced development team
Integrated app into CRM
Build data pipelines and BI dashboards

projects.name: Campus Manager
projects.description: Learning Management System and Course Management Tool
highlights: Learning Management System and Course Management Tool
Creator and current maintainer
Over 700 Users
Supports web hooks with Zapier
Powerful reporting engine
Built with MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, Passport.js, Backbone.js, and React.js

projects.name: AdFree.Life

Sets up a pre-configured Pi-Hole on a dedicated VPS
Uses cron jobs to generate trials
Hit #11 on Hacker News! (https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=14910683)

projects.name: YoSQL

Creator and current maintainer
Integrates with Zapier for web hook functionality
Save and share queries

skills.name: Sales Ops
keywords: Automate workflows and movement of data

skills.name: Cybersecurity
keywords: Ensure compliance in technical and business architecture
Treat sensitive data as a liability rather than an asset

skills.name: Business Intelligence
keywords: Map ETL pipelines to gather data from different services
Install and maintain SQL reports and data visualizations
Monitor KPIs and IT budgets to assess technological performance

skills.name: Support Operations
keywords: Provide tools needed to support customer troubleshooting

skills.name: Technology Vendor Relations
keywords: Research vendor products that align with business needs
Interface with vendor support if needed
Negotiate cost of vendor services if possible

skills.name: Qualifications
keywords: 8 years working in a technological role
Advanced technological skill set and a demonstrated history with technology
Knowledge of technological trends to build strategy
Ability to conduct technological analyses and research
Extensive industry knowledge with an eye towards the future
